user

Class ViewProfileController

  • java.lang.Object
    • user.ViewProfileController

  • public class ViewProfileController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class for the View Profile window. Contains methods for receiving data from the database and populating a table with the user's reservations.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ViewProfileController()

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      void addImageToList(java.io.InputStream binaryStream, java.lang.String filmName, java.lang.String description)
      Converts binary stream to image, creates an addImageToTable object and adds object to observableList
      void addImageToList(java.lang.String filmName, java.lang.String description)
      Creates an addImageToTable object and adds object to ObservableList 'reservationsData'
      void deleteReservation(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      Deletes reservation selected on table (by removing row in 'ReservationsDatabase') and updates the tableView
      void editUserInfo(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      Opens editUser Window.
      void initialize()
      Controller initialized with table columns for each variable we want to display.
      void setImageAndDescription()
      Sets image and description based upon current film selected
      void setUserEmailName(java.lang.String user)
      Method called in UserMainController to pass variable 'username' to this controller.
      void setUserMainController(UserMainController userMain)
      Links the ViewProfileController to the UserMainController object which birthed it.
      void viewAllReservations()
      Sets 'tableView' with all reservations in ObservableList 'reservationsData'

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        Controller initialized with table columns for each variable we want to display. Event listener also added in order to display poster of film selected.
